scripts.dev: sh -c "P=${PORT:-3000}; PID=$(lsof -tiTCP:$P -sTCP:LISTEN 2>/dev/null); if [ -n \"$PID\" ]; then echo \"ðŸ§¹ Freeing port $P (PID $PID)\"; kill -9 $PID; fi; nodemon src/server.js"
scripts.deps:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('node_modules')){ console.error('â›” node_modules missing. Run: npm i'); process.exit(1);} console.log('âœ… deps ok');"
scripts.backups:list: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const dir=path.resolve('backups'); if(!fs.existsSync(dir)){ console.log('No backups directory'); process.exit(0);} const files=fs.readdirSync(dir).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.db')).sort().reverse(); if(!files.length){ console.log('No .db backups found in backups/'); process.exit(0);} console.log('Backups (newest first):'); files.slice(0,20).forEach(f=>console.log(' - '+f));"
scripts.rollback:db: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const arg=process.argv[2]; if(!arg){ console.error('Usage: npm run rollback:db -- <backup-file.db>'); process.exit(1);} const backupsDir=path.resolve('backups'); const backupPath=path.join(backupsDir,arg); const dbPath=path.resolve('data/portal.db'); if(!fs.existsSync(backupPath)){ console.error('Backup not found: '+backupPath); process.exit(1);} if(!fs.existsSync(dbPath)){ console.error('DB not found: '+dbPath); process.exit(1);} const ts=new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g,'-'); const safety=path.join(backupsDir,'portal-pre-rollback-'+ts+'.db'); fs.copyFileSync(dbPath,safety); fs.copyFileSync(backupPath,dbPath); console.log('âœ… Rolled back DB to '+arg); console.log('âœ… Safety copy of previous DB saved as '+path.basename(safety));"
